item.xpansion.up_copper_heart: Upper Half of a Copper Heart
item.xpansion.down_copper_heart: Down Half of a Copper Heart
tooltip.xpansion.accolade: Place this item in your 6th slot to use its ability.
tooltip.xpansion.swift_cloak_description: A dark cloak that pushes wind with an extreme force.
tooltip.xpansion.swift_cloak_function: Press Space to dash in the direction you are facing.
tooltip.xpansion.climb_claw_description: A pair of sharp claws that can penetrate every object.
tooltip.xpansion.climb_claw_function: Hold Space to start climbing a surface.
tooltip.xpansion.gale_wings_function: Press Space to make a super jump.
tooltip.xpansion.charm: Place this item in your 7th, 8th or 9th slot to receive its effects.
tooltip.xpansion.iron_lotus_description: A union of discarded swords, now forming a bright flower.
tooltip.xpansion.iron_lotus_function: Grants the bearer the ability to strike stronger attacks quicker.
tooltip.xpansion.raging_soul_description: A floating golden orb with blue flames leaving it.
tooltip.xpansion.raging_soul_function: The bearer's damage is increased on low health.
tooltip.xpansion.blazeflint_description: A black rock shining with burning colors.
tooltip.xpansion.blazeflint_function: With every other hit, the bearer deals extra damage and sets the target on fire.
tooltip.xpansion.third_eye_band_descript: A black band that occludes almost all light.
tooltip.xpansion.third_eye_band_function: The bearer receives blindness, but is able to deal massive damage.
tooltip.xpansion.fragile_strength_descri: A glass disk with a claw imprinted to it.
tooltip.xpansion.fragile_strength_functi: The bearer's strength is increased, but the charm breaks after the bearer is killed.
tooltip.xpansion.enduring_strength_descr: A disk made of diamond with a claw imprinted on it.
tooltip.xpansion.void_skull_description: A black skull with void leaking from it, the sludge tangles with your hand.
tooltip.xpansion.void_skull_function: The strength and speed of the bearer is greatly increased, but he takes double damage.
tooltip.xpansion.quick_feet_description: A homemade charm resembling a small boot.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_scurry_descrip: A totem that carries the scared spirit of a rat.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_scurry_functio: The bearer gets an increased speed after taking damage.
tooltip.xpansion.swift_feather_descripti: A black feather that seems to move on its own.
tooltip.xpansion.swift_feather_function: Makes the bearer's cloak propulsion have a shorter cooldown.
tooltip.xpansion.storm_compass_descripti: A compass that can manipulate the wind blowing around it.
tooltip.xpansion.storm_compass_function: Makes the bearer's cloak be able to dash in any direction.
tooltip.xpansion.explosive_propulsor_des: An mechanical structure that converts gunpowder in thrust.
tooltip.xpansion.explosive_propulsor_fun: The bearer consumes 2 gunpowder to make its wings fly higher.
tooltip.xpansion.copper_heart_descriptio: Two halves of a heart, now together and fully functional.
tooltip.xpansion.copper_heart_function: Makes the bearer tougher after taking great injuries.
tooltip.xpansion.cherry_bouquet_descript: A pretty bouquet with shining petals.
tooltip.xpansion.cherry_bouquet_function: Makes so that the bearer has a chance of not taking damage, increasing that chance after taking damage and resetting after not.
tooltip.xpansion.blazing_amber_descripti: A blazing gem that generates heat, it seems that it cannot be melted by lava.
tooltip.xpansion.blazing_amber_function: Makes the bearer immune to fire damage for 5 seconds, with an 8 second cooldown after that.
tooltip.xpansion.hunter_mask_description: A grey mask that was used by one of the greatest hunter in history.
tooltip.xpansion.hunter_mask_function: Makes the bearer invisible when sprinting.
tooltip.xpansion.ring_magnet_description: A necklace that holds a red metal plate, it seems to attract other items to it.
tooltip.xpansion.ring_magnet_function: Dropped items can be pulled to the bearer from farther.
tooltip.xpansion.golden_cup_description: A golden cup ornamented with multiple gems.
tooltip.xpansion.golden_cup_function: Increases the drops of pickaxes by one.
tooltip.xpansion.mending_silk_descriptio: A totem of a spider with a roll of silk connected to it.
tooltip.xpansion.mending_silk_function: Consumes silk to repair the toll the bearer is holding.
tooltip.xpansion.hunger_pit_description: A living organism that is always needing to eat.
tooltip.xpansion.hunger_pit_function: The bearer's eating speed is increased.
tooltip.xpansion.coral_crown_description: An ancient crown lost thousands of years ago, rumors said that this belonged to an ancient civilization.
tooltip.xpansion.coral_crown_function: The bearer can breathe and swim faster underwater.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_leeching_descr: A golden statue resembling a leech.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_leeching_funct: The bearer can suck the living force out of targets, healing itself in the process.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_withering_desc: A black totem that seems to corrupt everything around it.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_withering_func: The bearer deals withering damage to targets.
tooltip.xpansion.ancient_totem_descripti: A wooden totem with a weird creature depicted, legends said that this totem came from space.
tooltip.xpansion.ancient_totem_function: Grants a slow falling effect to the bearer.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_shulking_descr: A purple totem resembling a box.
tooltip.xpansion.totem_of_shulking_funct: Targets hurt by the bearer will float for a second before falling.
